attributes.action: NHS pay rise a minimum of 2%
attributes.additional_details: NHS workers working multiple 12 hour shifts a week which are already physically and mentally draining without COVID-19. Immense pressure that COVID has brought them, risking not only their own lives but their families too. The government say how amazing they have been, show them how much you appreciate them. Billions of pound was spent on NHS Track and Trace, Millions going to be put into teaching, why can’t more money be put into NHS pay?
attributes.background: NHS deserve more than a 1% pay rise after all they have done for us this past year battling COVID-19.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373
